step.sql: SELECT P.* FROM TMC_POINT P WHERE P.CID [citycode];
SELECT P.* FROM TMC_POINT_TRANSLATENAME P,TMC_POINT T WHERE T.CID [citycode] AND P.TMC_ID=T.TMC_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM TMC_LINE P WHERE P.CID [citycode];
SELECT P.* FROM TMC_LINE_TRANSLATENAME P,TMC_LINE T WHERE T.CID [citycode] AND P.TMC_ID=T.TMC_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM TMC_AREA P WHERE P.CID [citycode];
SELECT P.* FROM TMC_AREA_TRANSLATENAME P ,TMC_AREA T WHERE T.CID [citycode] AND P.TMC_ID=T.TMC_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM TMC_VERSION P WHERE P.LOCTABLE_ID [citycode];
